text: Hianagi Horoni kumateti ne' Sanbalati'ma, Amoniti ne' Tobiaki, Araputi ne' Gesemi'ma hu'za amana eri'zama eriku'ma huna nanekema nentahi'za, tusi tagiza nere'za zokago kea amanage hu'za hurante'naze, tamagra ama na'a hu'za nehaze? Tamagra kuma kegina ete azeri o'netitma, kini ne'mofona ha' hunte'za nehazo?
